Traits.Name: Ribbonesque Absorption
Traits.Content: The Cache Leech can absorb written text and erase meaning from objects or messages it touches.

Traits.Name: Evasive Presence
Traits.Content: The Cache Leech has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against attacks due to its unearthly and deceptive movements.

Actions.Name: Ribbin Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 9 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Targets must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or be affected by confusion, unable to focus clearly on their tasks for 1 minute.

Actions.Name: Text Eraser Swipe
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage. Targets must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on their next attack roll as their words seem to fade away.

Actions.Name: Ribbone Cascade
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. Targets must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have a portion of their memory temporarily erased, granting them disadvantage on Intelligence checks for 1 minute.
